net.sf.opensftp.impl
Class BaseProgressListener

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.opensftp.AbstractProgressListener
      net.sf.opensftp.impl.BaseProgressListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, ProgressListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlainProgressListener
public abstract class BaseProgressListener
extends AbstractProgressListener

If you want to plug a ProgressListener module into net.sf.opensftp.impl.SftpUtil, your ProgressListener must extend this class.

Since:
0.2
Author:
BurningXFlame@gmail.com
